live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter and will be working to restore service as soon as possible.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36112.summary: Some customers in the Summerwood area of Sherwood Park are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36112.title: Apr 10 – Sherwood Park (Summerwood) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
